fields.summary: [Julia][Doc] Update lists of supported languages to include Julia

quinnj opened a new pull request #8884:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8884


   Apologies if this is totally wrong, but I wanted to try and kick off updating documentation around the Julia implementation. If anyone has pointers on what else needs to be updated, I'd appreciate the direction. I couldn't seem to find the arrow.apache.org homepage code anywhere, so I suspect it might live in a different repo all together.
